remarks: A comparison test for convergence of a complex infinite series. (Contributed by NM, 25-Apr-2005.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 27-May-2014.)
statement:
cvgcmpce.1 $e |- Z = ( ZZ>= ` M ) $.
cvgcmpce.2 $e |- ( ph -> N e. Z ) $.
cvgcmpce.3 $e |- ( ( ph /\ k e. Z ) -> ( F ` k ) e. RR ) $.
cvgcmpce.4 $e |- ( ( ph /\ k e. Z ) -> ( G ` k ) e. CC ) $.
cvgcmpce.5 $e |- ( ph -> seq M ( + , F ) e. dom ~~> ) $.
cvgcmpce.6 $e |- ( ph -> C e. RR ) $.
cvgcmpce.7 $e |- ( ( ph /\ k e. ( ZZ>= ` N ) ) -> ( abs ` ( G ` k ) ) <_ ( C x. ( F ` k ) ) ) $.
cvgcmpce $p |- ( ph -> seq M ( + , G ) e. dom ~~> ) $.
$d C k $.
$d F k $.
$d G k $.
$d M k $.
$d N k $.
$d Z k $.
$d k ph $.
